title: Episode 214: Rock The Mic (Feat. Fantasia)
itunes:title: Episode 214: Rock The Mic (Feat. Fantasia)
description:
Singer Fantasia joins the ladies of Lip Service this week to promote her upcoming album 'Sketchbook.' Fantasia opens up about her personal life, explaining how/why she got married after knowing her man for just 3 weeks, as well as how she managed going celibate. The ladies even give Fantasia homework...making sure that she's not too embarrassed to 'rock the mic.' Enjoy! ***LIP SERVICE LIVE TOUR*** October 20th - Philadelphia, PC October 21st - NYC, NY October 27th - Charlotte, NC October 28th - Washington

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
